metadata.name: TESTOSTERONE
metadata.description: In this collection, we wanted to show an abstract study of different hormones in the human body. Every person continues his life with this rule of human nature, regardless of race, gender, appearance. In fact, even if we are not aware of it, these hormons, which dominate our entire body and even our thoughts, are basically the source of all our actions, behaviors and decisions. Sometimes we are emotional, sometimes angry, sometimes happy, and sometimes very excited. All the emotions we have are the result of these hormones, even love, which is the strongest feeling in the world. What if you could have a symbol of these hormones secreted inside our body? To have endless adrenaline, the happiness hormon everyone wants, the male and female gender power that is the source of love, or a mixture of all these? A BLEND OF ADRENALINE, ENDORPHIN, TESTERONE, ESTROGEN AND PERCEPTION (MIX OF HORMONS) are with youâ€¦
